pageContext.claim: “Fake News @CNN is reporting that I am ‘still using personal cell phone for calls despite repeated security warnings.’ This is totally false information and reporting. I haven't had a personal cell phone for years. Only use government approved and issued phones. Retract!”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Post has also reported that Trump continues to use unsecured cell phone lines, raising concerns among national security professionals. "President Trump has routinely communicated with his personal lawyer, Rudolph W. Giuliani, and other individuals speaking on cell phones vulnerable to monitoring by Russian and other foreign intelligence services, current and former U.S. officials said," The Post reported Dec. 6, on the same day as these remarks.
